branchCategory.name: Belt Drive with Guide Rod
branchCategory.description: An LEL slider type electric actuator features a load mounting carriage that travels on guide rails. The parallel belt drive and horizontally mounted motor offer a surface height lower than comparable LEF models. The belt drive offers higher speeds than a ball screw drive, while the construction offers the lowest cost.

branchItem.name: LEL Electric Actuator/Guide Rod Slider, Belt Drive, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
branchItem.description: An LEL slider type electric actuator features a load mounting carriage that travels on guide rails. The parallel belt drive and horizontally mounted motor offer a surface height lower than comparable LEF models. The belt drive offers higher speeds than a ball screw drive, while the construction offers the lowest cost.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body size: 25 <LI>Table height: 48 mm <LI>Maximum speed: 1000 mm/s <LI>Maximum stroke: 1000 mm <LI>Bearing types: sliding bushings or ball bushing bearings
</LI></UL>
